post.body: and @herbwoman It *is* delicious!
Touche!
Come to my neck of the woods. My snow will kick your desert snow's ass ;)
BRILLIANT! Fa-ra-ra-ra-ra
Well that's just doo-diddly fine...you ROCK that mug.
Wear gloves...and take a picture.
It's easy to get enthusiastic about hot chocolate. Now the question is, will that be in a MASON JAR!!
Hot chocolate! Hot chocolate. Hot chocolate. There...that's four. Decision made!
And with that...g'night dear Twitter. See you all with presents!
Special Holiday Story is in the can. Mind you, it has nothing to do with the Holidays but it was still fun to do. You'll get it tomorrow.
Merry Christmas @resaliens! Thanks for the follow :)
Moved on to hot chocolate w/ Bailey's. Mmmmm...
cross /'kros/ n: a thing they nail people to. - SCROOGED.
Father Loves Beaver. Bwahahahahaha...
I love you guys...Merry Christmas
I got the answer I was waiting for. @mightymur says Scrooged and Scrooged it shall be! With a beer, of course.
Got 1 vote for Christmas Story and one for Scrooged. Two more...
We get snow all for the last week and on Christmas Eve...rain! What the fuck Mother Nature. Where's the love!
Should I watch A Christmas Story, Scrooged or just pass out after another beer? What say you?
On second thought, I'll save the intro chatter for the morning. That could be embarrassing.
